txt.en: Workers at Hammerstead fear rumblings coming from the within the mines.

'Creatures in the mines?! If these creatures are as vicious as you say, no one should be allowed to enter the Hammerstead mines. I will make sure the gates to the mines remain locked and guarded until NÃ¡in orders us to reopen them.'

'I have not seen anything strange but have certainly felt something strange beneath my feet. The miners have felt it, too. There are rumblings coming from within the mines. Everyone refuses to work as they fear a cave in. I do not blame them. What could be causing this strange shaking below?! You must find out for us.'
Aflur Smokebeard can be found at Hammerstead.\n\nYou should talk to Aflur Smokebeard.
Entrances to the mines can be found in Hammerstead.\n\nYou should investigate the mine entrances in Hammerstead.
